snippet: Songkick, an online service that alerts fans about local concerts by their favorite artists, has received a $10 million investment from Sequoia Capital. Ian Hogarth, Songkick's chief executive, spoke with Media Decoder on Thursday about the...
abstract: Songkick, an online service that alerts fans about local concerts by their favorite artists, has received a $10 million investment from Sequoia Capital. Ian Hogarth, Songkick's chief executive, spoke with Media Decoder on Thursday about the investment.

headline.main: Sequoia Capital Invests $10 Million in Songkick
